text: فَأَلۡقَوۡاْ حِبَالَهُمۡ وَعِصِيَّهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ بِعِزَّةِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

translation.en: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant
translation.id: Lalu mereka melemparkan tali-temali dan tongkat-tongkat mereka seraya berkata, "Demi kemuliaan Fir'aun, pasti kamilah yang akan menang
